name: fractal-27-c4
description: A unified theory with 17 unique research papers (12 bilingual EN+RU, 5 EN-only) proving adaptive strategy selection outperforms fixed approaches. Formally verified in Agda (Z3-cubed, 10/11 theorems) and empirically validated via MASTm (Multi-scale Adaptive Spectral TSP meta-solver, 0.22% gap on fl3795). Central thesis: Intelligence = adaptive routing.
central_thesis: Intelligence is not a single algorithm but adaptive routing: given a structural fingerprint of the input, select the strategy that matches. Proven for cognition (C4) and combinatorial optimization (MASTm).
main_topics: 27 cognitive basis states structured as Z3-cubed
Adaptive Routing Theorem: structure-based routing >= any fixed strategy
MASTm (Multi-scale Adaptive Spectral TSP meta-solver, 0.22% gap on fl3795)
DeBERTa text classifier (65 heads, 12 LoRA adapters)
17 unique research papers (12 bilingual EN+RU, 5 EN-only) across 3 paper directories
Applications to negotiation, personality typology, AI agents
